thread.title: Medeama receive transfer bid from Kotoko for defender Evans Quao
thread.title_full: Medeama receive transfer bid from Kotoko for defender Evans Quao

title: Medeama receive transfer bid from Kotoko for defender Evans Quao
text:
18:55 CET Medeama receive transfer bid from Kotoko for defender Evans Quao - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Medeama have confirmed they've received an offer from Kotoko for defender Evans Quao. 
The Porcupine Warriors have requested for the services of the talented central defender after he enjoyed a fabulous season with the Tarkwa-based side. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches,and loving favor than silver and gold. By: Oluwafemi daniel dos
